subTitle: Learn more about the goals, technology, and vision behind this satellite ground station project.
githubRepoNotConfiguredNote: Note: GitHub repository URL needs to be configured in the code.

generalObjective.title: General Objective
generalObjective.text: Develop and implement a functional satellite ground station integrated with the SatNOGS network, accompanied by a web platform for monitoring, data visualization, and educational outreach.

build.title: Build & Integrate
build.text: Assemble the ground station hardware and integrate it with the SatNOGS network for automated satellite tracking and data reception.

web.title: Develop Web Platform
web.text: Create a user-friendly website to display station status, received observations, satellite images, and relevant project information.

guide.title: Educate & Document
guide.text: Provide documentation and resources to educate users about satellite communication, radio technology, and the project itself.

techVision.title: Technology & Vision
techVision.text: Leveraging the power of the open-source <satnogsLink>SatNOGS network</satnogsLink> and software-defined radio, this project aims to foster interest in space science and technology within our university community and beyond.
